node.title: The Scott Peterson case: New evidence?
node.description: Peterson's death sentence for the murder of his pregnant wife Laci has been overturned. Now his supporters are pushing for a complete retrial.
node.content: ["What started out as a college romance ended in murder and mystery.\u00a0", "1994\u00a0\u2013\u00a0\u00a0Scott Peterson and Laci Rocha met in 1994 while both were attending college at California Polytechnic State University. They married two years later. In 2002, Laci became pregnant. The two lived in Modesto, California and planned to raise their unborn son Conner there."]
